XVisibilities

This entity allows you to enter the visibilities for different types of users and roles.

Adding Visibilities

To define new visibilities to your project,

  1. Select the XVisibilities entity. The XVisibilities list window is displayed.
  2. Click Add. The Add xvisibilities window is displayed.
  3. Enter Name and Description . These fields are mandatory.
  4. Once all fields are entered, click Save.

Deleting visibilities

If any visibility is to be removed from the list, use the delete function.

To delete a user:

  1. Under XVisibilities list, click to select the visibility to be deleted.
  2. Click Delete. The selected visibility is deleted from the list.

    Note:

    1. In case you do not select a Visibility, an error message is displayed stating “XVisibility not selected”.

Editing visibility details

You can edit the details including the name, description, roles and users that are applicable.

  1. Roles: The visibilities to be aligned to different roles has to be clearly defined and updated. Based on the roles assigned the users will be assigned different visbilities. The XRoles entity is used to assign visibilities to a role.
    1. To assign a role, under XVisibilities> Edit, select Visibility XRoles.
    2. Click Add. Click to select the XRole from the list. The Add function allows you to assign new visibilities to the new roles.
    3. Click Save. The visbility is assigned to the selected role.
  2. Users: The visibilities to be aligned to different users can be explicitly defined and updated here. Based on the user and the user's role the users will be assigned different visbilities. The XUsers entity is used to assign visibilities to a user.
    1. To assign a user, under XVisibilities> Edit, select Visibility XUsers.
    2. Click Add. Click to select the XUser from the list. The Add function allows you to assign new visibilities to the new users.
    3. Click Save. The visbility is assigned to the selected role.

Refresh

For all entities you will be able to Refresh that page to reflect the latest data and functions applicable for the entity.
